# sharingServicePicker(_:delegateFor:)

**Instance Method**

Asks your delegate to provide an object that the selected sharing service can use as its delegate.

## Declaration

```swift
optional func sharingServicePicker(_ sharingServicePicker: NSSharingServicePicker, delegateFor sharingService: NSSharingService) -> (any NSSharingServiceDelegate)?
```

## Parameters

- **sharingServicePicker**: The sharing service picker.
- **sharingService**: The selected sharing service.

## Return Value

An object that adopts the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSharingServiceDelegate] protocol.

## Discussion

The sharing service assigns the returned object to its [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSSharingService/delegate] property.

## Customizing Behavior

- **sharingServicePicker(_:didChoose:)**: Tells the delegate that the person selected a sharing service for the current item.
